text: William Clyde "Chase" Elliott II (born November 28, 1995) is a professional NASCAR driver. In 2016, he replaced Jeff Gordon as the driver of the #24 car for Hendrick Motorsports. He is the son of NASCAR hall of famer Bill Elliott. He won the 2014 NASCAR XFINITY Series Championship. Category:NASCAR drivers Category:Living people Category:1995 births
title: Chase Elliott
